content.rendered:
About

Enhancing homes with energy-efficient, sustainable solutions.

LEADING REAL ESTATE AGENT IN THE CITY

Fast Track - Real Estate Experts

Fast Track Improvements, established in 2020, is a trusted partner for out-of-state investors in Detroit. We specialize in sourcing, purchasing, and rehabilitating homes, offering licensed expertise and a deep understanding of the local market. Our dedicated team ensures seamless real estate investment and renovation solutions tailored to our clients’ needs.

Contact Us
OPTIMIZING WORKFLOW

The Blueprint of Our Processes

01:Free Consultation

We start with a free consultation to understand your investment goals and budget. This allows us to tailor our services to meet your needs and provide you with the best opportunities.

02:Property Sourcing and Evaluation

Our licensed agents identify and evaluate potential properties that align with your investment objectives. We conduct thorough inspections and provide detailed assessments to help you make informed decisions.

03:Full Renovation Estimate

Once you've selected a property, our experienced team provides a comprehensive renovation estimate that outlines the scope of work and associated costs. This gives you a clear picture of the investment required.

04:Financing Assistance and Deal Analysis

We help set you up with a lender to secure financing for your investment. Additionally, we analyze the deal based on the rehab amount to determine the potential final profit. This step helps ensure that you have a clear understanding of the financial implications while the property is under contract.

05:Project Management

Our project manager oversees the entire renovation process, from selecting qualified subcontractors to coordinating schedules and ensuring quality control. We keep you updated on progress and address any concerns along the way.

06:Utility Setup and Winter Security Package

We set up essential utilities, provide winter security by removing furnaces and tanks, and offer snow removal and bi-weekly mowing to maintain and protect your properties year-round.

07:Post-Renovation Support

Once the renovation is complete, we offer post-rehab cleaning services and final inspections to ensure your property is ready for sale or rent. Our team is here to assist you every step of the way.

08:Sale or Rental Setup

When the property is ready, we will help you either sell it for a profit or set it up for renting. If you choose to rent the property, we will connect you with one of our partnered rental management companies to ensure a smooth transition and efficient property management.

FACES BEHIND THE EXCELLENCE

Meet the Team

Ryan Lonsway

CEO / Senior Agent

Ryan, the co-owner and head of the agency at Fast Track Improvements, specializes in sourcing lucrative deals for investors. With a deep understanding of the local market and an exceptional ability to identify opportunities, he excels at finding the best investments for our clients. Ryan has closed over 250 homes and facilitated sales transactions totaling over $25 million. His expertise and dedication make him an invaluable asset to both our team and our clients.

Brian Hayden

CTO / Founder / Agent

Brian, the founder of Fast Track Improvements in 2020, is a licensed builder and a licensed real estate agent in multiple states. With extensive experience in the real estate industry, he has personally purchased, renovated, and refinanced dozens of rental properties. Brian's hands-on experience as a client of his own company drives his focus on client satisfaction. His expertise and dedication ensure that every project meets the highest standards, reflecting his commitment to excellence and client success.

Katie Desmone

Operations Manager

As operations manager, Katie ensures the seamless operation of business activities, facilitates effective communication with clients, and brings extensive experience in administration and office management. With a passion for assisting clients with their investments, Katie thrives in a collaborative environment, fostering strong relationships between clients and employees to drive the success of Fast Track Improvements.

Rick Vecchi

Senior Project Manager

As the senior project manager at Fast Track Improvements, Rick brings a wealth of experience from property management to our team. With 24 years of service as the director of construction for a local property management company, Rick has a proven track record of overseeing successful projects. Additionally, he has over 10 years of experience as an HVAC technician and installer, as well as in the plumbing field. His extensive background and expertise make him a critical asset to our project management team.

John Lukasik

Project Coordinator

John plays a crucial role at Fast Track Improvements, conducting site visits, taking progress photos for daily logs, ensuring properties and projects are progressing smoothly, assisting with compliance, and coordinating utility setups. His hands-on approach and attention to detail help maintain high standards and ensure our projects stay on track.

Samantha Mills

Marketing / Finance

Samantha serves as both the financial advisor and marketing manager at Fast Track Improvements. She brings valuable experience as an analyst for a large financial firm, combining her financial acumen with strategic marketing expertise to drive our company's growth and success.

UNRIVALED EXCELLENCE

Why We're the Premier Choice

At Fast Track Improvements, we believe in transparency, quality, and exceptional service. Our streamlined process is designed to make your real estate investment journey smooth and successful. Let us help you turn your investment vision into reality.

join Us
